summary: Richard spots a man dumping a body, and decides to expose the man he thinks is the culprit with his friend Alex Cutter.
cast: Jeff Bridges|John Heard|Lisa Eichhorn|Ann Dusenberry|Stephen Elliott|Arthur Rosenberg|Nina van Pallandt|Patricia Donahue|Geraldine Baron|Katherine Pass|Francis X. McCarthy|George Planco|Jay Fletcher|George Dickerson|Jack Murdock|Essex Smith|Rod Gist|Leonard Lightfoot|Julia Duffy|Randall Hicks|Roy Hollis|Billy Drago|Caesar Cordova|Jonathan Terry|William Pelt|Ron Marcroft|Ted White|Tony Epper|Andy Epper|Chris Howell|H.P. Evetts|Ron Burke|Dan Pattarson|Fox Purtill|Paul Thomas|Mark Valenti
title: El camino de Cutter
